AssociateCreatedArtifact.name: AssociateCreatedArtifact
AssociateCreatedArtifact.description: Grants permission to associate a given AWS artifact to a MigrationTask

AssociateDiscoveredResource.name: AssociateDiscoveredResource
AssociateDiscoveredResource.description: Grants permission to associate a given ADS resource to a MigrationTask

CreateHomeRegionControl.name: CreateHomeRegionControl
CreateHomeRegionControl.description: Grants permission to create a Migration Hub Home Region Control

CreateProgressUpdateStream.name: CreateProgressUpdateStream
CreateProgressUpdateStream.description: Grants permission to create a ProgressUpdateStream

DeleteHomeRegionControl.name: DeleteHomeRegionControl
DeleteHomeRegionControl.description: Grants permission to delete a Migration Hub Home Region Control

DeleteProgressUpdateStream.name: DeleteProgressUpdateStream
DeleteProgressUpdateStream.description: Grants permission to delete a ProgressUpdateStream

DescribeApplicationState.name: DescribeApplicationState
DescribeApplicationState.description: Grants permission to get an Application Discovery Service Application's state

DescribeHomeRegionControls.name: DescribeHomeRegionControls
DescribeHomeRegionControls.description: Grants permission to list Home Region Controls

DescribeMigrationTask.name: DescribeMigrationTask
DescribeMigrationTask.description: Grants permission to describe a MigrationTask

DisassociateCreatedArtifact.name: DisassociateCreatedArtifact
DisassociateCreatedArtifact.description: Grants permission to disassociate a given AWS artifact from a MigrationTask

DisassociateDiscoveredResource.name: DisassociateDiscoveredResource
DisassociateDiscoveredResource.description: Grants permission to disassociate a given ADS resource from a MigrationTask

GetHomeRegion.name: GetHomeRegion
GetHomeRegion.description: Grants permission to get the Migration Hub Home Region

ImportMigrationTask.name: ImportMigrationTask
ImportMigrationTask.description: Grants permission to import a MigrationTask

ListApplicationStates.name: ListApplicationStates
ListApplicationStates.description: Grants permission to list Application statuses

ListCreatedArtifacts.name: ListCreatedArtifacts
ListCreatedArtifacts.description: Grants permission to list associated created artifacts for a MigrationTask

ListDiscoveredResources.name: ListDiscoveredResources
ListDiscoveredResources.description: Grants permission to list associated ADS resources from MigrationTask

ListProgressUpdateStreams.name: ListProgressUpdateStreams
ListProgressUpdateStreams.description: Grants permission to to list ProgressUpdateStreams

NotifyApplicationState.name: NotifyApplicationState
NotifyApplicationState.description: Grants permission to update an Application Discovery Service Application's state

NotifyMigrationTaskState.name: NotifyMigrationTaskState
NotifyMigrationTaskState.description: Grants permission to notify latest MigrationTask state
